body:
i'm thankful for _[shirkers](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u3wPWCj2L6I)_, which you can watch on netflix, and should.

i'm thankful that i have done yoga and meditated yesterday and today, and am thankful to hope that i can keep up the streak for the rest of the week.

i'm thankful for the feeling of getting into bed.
